MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:56AM in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor following reports of a grounded overhead line conductor. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:58AM on 3rd March 2021
